item.title: oh god what am I doing
item.author: me@robxu9.com (Robert Xu)
item.description: Ah, December. The time of year where there’s a surprising lack of snow on the ground, finals are over surprisingly early, and time for pondering life has become plentiful. Which brings me to pondering life and my decisions. What on earth am I doing? Where will I be after I graduate? What do I want to do? My initial thought was to go and try to pursue a MBA, because that’s useful and all, but somewhere along the line I saw all the applications and became less enthusiastic.

item.title: sophomore year, take two
item.author: me@robxu9.com (Robert Xu)
item.description: Long story short: CSE 306: Operating Systems CSE 312: Ethics CSE 320: System Architecture MEC 280: Pollution & Human Health CCS 202: Film Genres I hope I survive.
